title: Local Scope and Functions
content: Variables which are declared within a function, as well as function parameters, have local scope. That means they are only visible within that function.
Here is a function myTest with a local variable called loc.
The myTest() function call will display the string foo in the console. The console.log(loc) line(outside the myTest function) will throw an error, as loc in not defined outside of the function.
